# Interface LoggerConfigInterface

Configuration for telemetry logging

#### Description

Controls logging behavior and verbosity levels

interface LoggerConfigInterface {  
level?: [LogLevel](/enums/telemetry.LogLevel);  
sinkAbslLogs?: boolean;  
}

##### Index

### Properties

level? sinkAbslLogs?

## Properties

### `Optional`level

level?: [LogLevel](/enums/telemetry.LogLevel)

The minimum log level to capture

#### Default


```
LogLevel.INFO

```


#### Description

Only logs at or above this level will be recorded

### `Optional`sinkAbslLogs

sinkAbslLogs?: boolean

Whether to capture absl (abseil) library logs

#### Default


```
true

```


#### Description

Controls integration with the absl logging library

### Settings

Member Visibility

  * Protected
  * Inherited
  * External



ThemeOSLightDark

Properties
